elements.text: You are put in charge of your office's fundraising efforts and quickly realize that your coworkers are not very interested in the fundraising. At a meeting, you give a presentation about the importance of helping with the fundraising, during which your coworkers remain quiet. As you sit down after your presentation, you think they seemed...

elements.name: Fundraiser presentation_Social Situations_puzzle1
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
